title: 2 teens shot in accidental shooting in SW Atlanta
content:
ATLANTA – Police responded to a report of two teens accidentally shot in southwest Atlanta early Wednesday evening.
It happened near the intersection of Cleveland Avenue and Old Hapeville Road at about 6:15 p.m.
According to Atlanta police, a 13-year-old had been shot in the hand and a 15-year-old was shot in the leg – both apparently by the same bullet.
Lukasz Sajdak with the Atlanta Police Department told 11Alive News that a camera showed a group of four males standing on a corner huddled together, then taking off running when the shooting occurred.
The police investigation into the incident is ongoing.
